tier.item: b. har gâv gand châle dahân-i âtashfeshân-e roshan-e xashm-i shod
each cow rotten pit mouth-indef volcano-Ez lighted-Ez anger-indef became
"every cow rotten pit mouthed turned into an erupted volcano"
